message.description: Captures real-time sensor readings for environmental, operational, and safety monitoring.
Monitors the production lifecycle of products, from assembly to completion.
Records inspection results at various production stages to ensure product quality.
Tracks the transport status of manufactured products, including destination and delivery updates

info.description: The **Fabrication Lab Event Publisher** is a critical application in the manufacturing ecosystem, responsible for streaming real-time events related to production, shipping, maintenance, quality control, inventory, HR, and sensor monitoring. It provides a structured event-driven architecture that enables seamless tracking of product lifecycle stages, employee access, machine health, material availability, and environmental conditions within a fabrication lab. By publishing standardized events, the system enhances operational visibility, ensures timely decision-making, and facilitates automation across multiple manufacturing sites, optimizing efficiency and reducing downtime.
info.title: FabricationLab
